name: Coaching Session Frequency
formula: Total Number of Coaching Sessions / Specified Time Period

metadata.business_insights: Reveals the emphasis on and regularity of coaching, which can impact sales rep development and performance.
metadata.measurement_approach: The number of coaching sessions held within a specified period, such as monthly or quarterly.
metadata.visualization_suggestions:
* Line charts showing the trend of coaching session frequency over time for each sales rep.
* Comparison bar charts to visualize the variance in coaching session frequency among different sales reps.

description: The number of coaching sessions provided to each sales rep within a given time period.

name: Competency Improvement Rate
formula: (Number of Competencies Improved Post-Training / Total Number of Competencies Targeted) * 100

metadata.business_insights: Highlights the effectiveness of training in enhancing the skills and abilities necessary for sales success.
metadata.measurement_approach: The rate at which sales reps show improvements in competencies identified as crucial for their role post-training.
metadata.visualization_suggestions:
* Line charts showing the trend of competency improvement rate over time.
* Comparison charts to visualize the competency improvement rate across different sales teams or regions.

description: The rate at which sales reps improve their competencies and skills through training.

name: Conversion Rate from Training to Sales
formula: (Number of Sales Made by Trained Reps / Number of Trained Reps) * 100

metadata.business_insights: Indicates the direct impact of training on sales performance and can inform the ROI of sales training initiatives.
metadata.measurement_approach: The percentage of sales reps who successfully apply training to close deals or generate revenue.
metadata.visualization_suggestions:
* Line charts showing the trend of conversion rates over time.
* Comparison bar charts to visualize the performance of different sales reps or teams.

description: The percentage of sales reps who complete training and coaching and go on to achieve sales targets. A higher conversion rate indicates effective training and coaching.
